blocks.content: Justification theorem for ~ df-nfc . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm nfcjust(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wb(wal(s0, wnf(s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wal(s2, wnf(s1, wcel(cv(s2), c0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  cbvalvw(s0, s2, wnf(s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wnf(s1, wcel(cv(s2), c0)))
  nfbidv(s1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c0))
  eleq1w(s0, s2, c0)
  diff.wnf.s(s0, s1, wcel(cv(s2), c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(s2), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.wnf.s(s2, s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), cv(s2))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nfcjust(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  ⊢ (∀(s0, F/(s1, s0 ∈ c0))↔ ∀(s2, F/(s1, s2 ∈ c0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
} = {
  cbvalvw(s0, s2, F/(s1, s0 ∈ c0), F/(s1, s2 ∈ c0))
  nfbidv(s1, s0 = s2, s0 ∈ c0, s2 ∈ c0)
  eleq1w(s0, s2, c0)
  diff.wnf.s(s0, s1, s2 ∈ c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, s2, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.wnf.s(s2, s1, s0 ∈ c0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, s0, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
}

blocks.name: df-nfc
blocks.content: Define the not-free predicate for classes. This is read " ` x ` is not free in ` A ` ". Not-free means that the value of ` x ` cannot affect the value of ` A ` , e.g., any occurrence of ` x ` in ` A ` is effectively bound by a "for all" or something that expands to one (such as "there exists"). It is defined in terms of the not-free predicate ~ df-nf for wffs; see that definition for more information. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Aug-2016.)

blocks.name: nfcrii
blocks.content: Consequence of the not-free predicate. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Aug-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm nfcrii(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wal(s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  -| wnfc(s1, c0)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  3imtr3i(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wal(s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wsb(s0, hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wal(s1, wsb(s0, hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))))
  nf5ri(s1, wsb(s0, hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  nfsbv(s1, s0, hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  nfcriv(s1, hs0, c0)
  albii(s1, wsb(s0, hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  clelsb3(s0, hs0, c0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nfcrii(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ⊢ (s0 ∈ c0 → ∀(s1, s0 ∈ c0))
  ⊣ F/(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
} = {
  3imtr3i(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1, s0 ∈ c0), [s0 / hs0]hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1,[s0 / hs0]hs0 ∈ c0))
  nf5ri(s1, [s0 / hs0]hs0 ∈ c0)
  nfsbv(s1, s0, hs0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  nfcriv(s1, hs0, c0)
  albii(s1, [s0 / hs0]hs0 ∈ c0, s0 ∈ c0)
  clelsb3(s0, hs0, c0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: nfcri

blocks.name: nfceqdf
blocks.content: An equality theorem for effectively not free. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm nfceqdf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wnfc(s0, c0), wnfc(s0, c1)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
} = {
  3bitr4g(w0, wnfc(s0, c0), wnfc(s0, c1), wal(hs0, wnf(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))), wal(hs0, wnf(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  albidv(hs0, w0, wnf(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wnf(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  nfbidf(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  eleq2d(cv(hs0), c0, c1, w0)
  df-nfc(s0, hs0, c0)
  df-nfc(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nfceqdf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(F/(s0, c0)↔ F/(s0, c1)))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 = c1)
} = {
  3bitr4g(w0, F/(s0, c0), F/(s0, c1), ∀(hs0, F/(s0, hs0 ∈ c0)), ∀(hs0, F/(s0, hs0 ∈ c1)))
  albidv(hs0, w0, F/(s0, hs0 ∈ c0), F/(s0, hs0 ∈ c1))
  nfbidf(s0, w0, hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1)
  eleq2d(hs0, c0, c1, w0)
  df-nfc(s0, hs0, c0)
  df-nfc(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: nfceqi
blocks.content: Equality theorem for class not-free. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Aug-2016.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 16-Nov-2019.) Avoid ~ ax-12 . (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 19-Jun-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm nfceqi(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wnfc(s0, c0), wnfc(s0, c1))
  -| wceq(c0, c1)
} = {
  3bitr4i(wnfc(s0, c0), wnfc(s0, c1), wal(hs0, wnf(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))), wal(hs0, wnf(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  albii(hs0, wnf(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wnf(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  nfbii(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  eleq2i(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  df-nfc(s0, hs0, c0)
  df-nfc(s0, hs0, c1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nfceqi(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (F/(s0, c0)↔ F/(s0, c1))
  ⊣ c0 = c1
} = {
  3bitr4i(F/(s0, c0), F/(s0, c1), ∀(hs0, F/(s0, hs0 ∈ c0)), ∀(hs0, F/(s0, hs0 ∈ c1)))
  albii(hs0, F/(s0, hs0 ∈ c0), F/(s0, hs0 ∈ c1))
  nfbii(s0, hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1)
  eleq2i(hs0, c0, c1)
  df-nfc(s0, hs0, c0)
  df-nfc(s0, hs0, c1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: clelsb3f
blocks.content: Substitution applied to an atomic wff (class version of ~ elsb3 ). (Contributed by Rodolfo Medina, 28-Apr-2010.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 14-Jun-2011.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 13-Mar-2017.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 7-May-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm clelsb3f(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  -| wnfc(s1, c0)
} = {
  3bitr3i(wsb(s0, s1, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wsb(s0, s1, wsb(s1, hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))), wsb(s0, hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  sbco2(s0, s1, hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  nfcri(s1, hs0, c0)
  sbbii(s0, s1, wsb(s1, hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cv(s1), c0))
  clelsb3(s1, hs0, c0)
  clelsb3(s0, hs0, c0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm clelsb3f(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ⊢ ([s0 / s1]s1 ∈ c0 ↔ s0 ∈ c0)
  ⊣ F/(s1, c0)
} = {
  3bitr3i([s0 / s1]s1 ∈ c0, s0 ∈ c0, [s0 / s1][s1 / hs0]hs0 ∈ c0, [s0 / hs0]hs0 ∈ c0)
  sbco2(s0, s1, hs0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  nfcri(s1, hs0, c0)
  sbbii(s0, s1, [s1 / hs0]hs0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c0)
  clelsb3(s1, hs0, c0)
  clelsb3(s0, hs0, c0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: nfeqd
blocks.content: Hypothesis builder for equality. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm nfeqd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wnf(s0, wceq(c0, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wnfc(s0, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wnfc(s0, c1))
} = {
  nfxfrd(s0, w0, wceq(c0, c1), wal(hs0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  dfcleq(hs0, c0, c1)
  nfald(s0, hs0, w0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  nfbid(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  nfcrd(s0, hs0, c0, w0)
  nfcrd(s0, hs0, c1, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nfeqd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → F/(s0, c0 = c1))
  ⊣ (w0 → F/(s0, c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → F/(s0, c1))
} = {
  nfxfrd(s0, w0, c0 = c1, ∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈ c0 ↔ hs0 ∈ c1)))
  dfcleq(hs0, c0, c1)
  nfald(s0, hs0, w0, (hs0 ∈ c0 ↔ hs0 ∈ c1))
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  nfbid(s0, w0, hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1)
  nfcrd(s0, hs0, c0, w0)
  nfcrd(s0, hs0, c1, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: nfeld
blocks.content: Hypothesis builder for elementhood. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm nfeld(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wnf(s0, wcel(c0, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wnfc(s0, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wnfc(s0, c1))
} = {
  nfxfrd(s0, w0, wcel(c0, c1), wex(hs0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  df-clel(hs0, c0, c1)
  nfexd(s0, hs0, w0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  nfand(s0, w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  nfeqd(s0, cv(hs0), c0, w0)
  nfcvd(s0, cv(hs0), w0)
  nfcrd(s0, hs0, c1, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nfeld(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → F/(s0, c0 ∈ c1))
  ⊣ (w0 → F/(s0, c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → F/(s0, c1))
} = {
  nfxfrd(s0, w0, c0 ∈ c1, ∃(hs0,(hs0 = c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1)))
  df-clel(hs0, c0, c1)
  nfexd(s0, hs0, w0, (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1))
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  nfand(s0, w0, hs0 = c0, hs0 ∈ c1)
  nfeqd(s0, hs0, c0, w0)
  nfcvd(s0, hs0, w0)
  nfcrd(s0, hs0, c1, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm nfnfc(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wnf(s0, wnfc(s1, c0))

  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)

  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)

blocks.pretty:
thm nfnfc(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ⊢ F/(s0, F/(s1, c0))

} = {
  nfxfr(s0, F/(s1, c0), ∀(hs0, F/(s1, hs0 ∈ c0)))

  nfal(s0, hs0, F/(s1, hs0 ∈ c0))
  nfnf(s0, s1, hs0 ∈ c0)
  nfcriv(s0, hs0, c0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)

blocks.name: drnfc1
blocks.content: Formula-building lemma for use with the Distinctor Reduction Theorem. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Oct-2016.) Avoid ~ ax-11 . (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 10-May-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm drnfc1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wb(wnfc(s0, c0), wnfc(s1, c1)))
  -| wi(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(c0, c1))
} = {
  3bitr4g(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wnfc(s0, c0), wnfc(s1, c1), wal(hs0, wnf(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))), wal(hs0, wnf(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  albidv(hs0, wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wnf(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wnf(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  drnf1(s0, s1, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  eleq2d(cv(hs0), c0, c1, wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  df-nfc(s0, hs0, c0)
  df-nfc(s1, hs0, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm drnfc1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (∀(s0, s0 = s1)→(F/(s0, c0)↔ F/(s1, c1)))
  ⊣ (∀(s0, s0 = s1)→ c0 = c1)
} = {
  3bitr4g(∀(s0, s0 = s1), F/(s0, c0), F/(s1, c1), ∀(hs0, F/(s0, hs0 ∈ c0)), ∀(hs0, F/(s1, hs0 ∈ c1)))
  albidv(hs0, ∀(s0, s0 = s1), F/(s0, hs0 ∈ c0), F/(s1, hs0 ∈ c1))
  drnf1(s0, s1, hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1)
  eleq2d(hs0, c0, c1, ∀(s0, s0 = s1))
  df-nfc(s0, hs0, c0)
  df-nfc(s1, hs0, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(∀(s0, s0 = s1))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: drnfc2
blocks.content: Formula-building lemma for use with the Distinctor Reduction Theorem. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm drnfc2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wb(wnfc(s2, c0), wnfc(s2, c1)))
  -| wi(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(c0, c1))
} = {
  3bitr4g(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wnfc(s2, c0), wnfc(s2, c1), wal(hs0, wnf(s2, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))), wal(hs0, wnf(s2, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  albidv(hs0, wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wnf(s2, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wnf(s2, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  drnf2(s0, s1, s2, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  eleq2d(cv(hs0), c0, c1, wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  df-nfc(s2, hs0, c0)
  df-nfc(s2, hs0, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

  albidv(hs0, ∀(s0, s0 = s1), F/(s2, hs0 ∈ c0), F/(s2, hs0 ∈ c1))
  drnf2(s0, s1, s2, hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1)

blocks.name: nfabd
blocks.content: Bound-variable hypothesis builder for a class abstraction. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Oct-2016.) Avoid ~ ax-9 and ~ ax-ext . (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 23-May-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm nfabd(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w0, wnfc(s0, cab(s1, w1)))
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wnf(s0, w1))
} = {
  nfcd(s0, hs0, cab(s1, w1), w0)
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  nfxfrd(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cab(s1, w1)), wsb(hs0, s1, w1))
  df-clab(hs0, s1, w1)
  nfsbd(s0, hs0, s1, w0, w1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cab(s1, w1))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nfabd(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ (w0 → F/(s0, { s1 | w1 }))
  ⊣ F/(s1, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → F/(s0, w1))
} = {
  nfcd(s0, hs0, { s1 | w1 }, w0)
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  nfxfrd(s0, w0, hs0 ∈ { s1 | w1 }, [hs0 / s1]w1)
  df-clab(hs0, s1, w1)
  nfsbd(s0, hs0, s1, w0, w1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c({ s1 | w1 })
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}

blocks.name: nfabd2
blocks.content: Bound-variable hypothesis builder for a class abstraction. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Oct-2016.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 10-May-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm nfabd2(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w0, wnfc(s0, cab(s1, w1)))
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wi(wa(w0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wnf(s0, w1))
} = {
  pm2.61d2(w0, wnfc(s0, cab(s1, w1)), wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  ex(w0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnfc(s0, cab(s1, w1)))
  nfabd(s0, s1, wa(w0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), w1)
  nfan(s1, w0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  nfnae(s1, s0, s1)
  mpbiri(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wnfc(s0, cab(s1, w1)), wnfc(s1, cab(s1, w1)))
  nfab1(s1, w1)
  drnfc1(s0, s1, cab(s1, w1), cab(s1, w1))
  eqidd(cab(s1, w1), wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
}

} = {

  ex(w0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnfc(s0, cab(s1, w1)))
  nfcd(s0, hs0, cab(s1, w1), wa(w0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  nfv(hs0, wa(w0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  nfxfrd(s0, wa(w0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wcel(cv(hs0), cab(s1, w1)), wsb(hs0, s1, w1))
  df-clab(hs0, s1, w1)
  nfsbd(s0, hs0, s1, wa(w0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), w1)
  nfan(s1, w0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  nfnae(s1, s0, s1)
  mpbiri(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wnfc(s0, cab(s1, w1)), wnfc(s1, cab(s1, w1)))

  drnfc1(s0, s1, cab(s1, w1), cab(s1, w1))
  eqidd(cab(s1, w1), wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))

  diff.hs0.s(s0)

blocks.pretty:
thm nfabd2OLD(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ (w0 → F/(s0, { s1 | w1 }))
  ⊣ F/(s1, w0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1))→ F/(s0, w1))
} = {
  pm2.61d2(w0, F/(s0, { s1 | w1 }), ∀(s0, s0 = s1))
  ex(w0, ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1), F/(s0, { s1 | w1 }))
  nfcd(s0, hs0, { s1 | w1 }, (w0 ∧ ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1)))
  nfv(hs0, (w0 ∧ ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1)))
  nfxfrd(s0, (w0 ∧ ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1)), hs0 ∈ { s1 | w1 }, [hs0 / s1]w1)
  df-clab(hs0, s1, w1)
  nfsbd(s0, hs0, s1, (w0 ∧ ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1)), w1)
  nfan(s1, w0, ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1))
  nfnae(s1, s0, s1)
  mpbiri(∀(s0, s0 = s1), F/(s0, { s1 | w1 }), F/(s1, { s1 | w1 }))
  nfab1(s1, w1)
  drnfc1(s0, s1, { s1 | w1 }, { s1 | w1 })
  eqidd({ s1 | w1 }, ∀(s0, s0 = s1))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c({ s1 | w1 })
  diff.hs0.w((w0 ∧ ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1)))
}

blocks.name: dvelimdc
blocks.content: Deduction form of ~ dvelimc . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm dvelimdc(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wi(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnfc(s0, c0)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnf(s2, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wnfc(s0, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wnfc(s2, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wceq(c1, c0)))
} = {
  ex(w0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnfc(s0, c0))
  nfcd(s0, hs0, c0, wa(w0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  nfv(hs0, wa(w0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  imp(w0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnf(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  dvelimdf(s0, s1, s2, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  nfcrd(s0, hs0, c1, w0)
  nfcrd(s2, hs0, c0, w0)
  syl6(w0, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wceq(c1, c0))
  eleq2(c1, c0, cv(hs0))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(w0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dvelimdc(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1)→ F/(s0, c0)))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s2, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → F/(s0, c1))
  ⊣ (w0 → F/(s2, c0))
  ⊣ (w0 →(s2 = s1 → c1 = c0))
} = {
  ex(w0, ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1), F/(s0, c0))
  nfcd(s0, hs0, c0, (w0 ∧ ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1)))
  nfv(hs0, (w0 ∧ ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1)))
  imp(w0, ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1), F/(s0, hs0 ∈ c0))
  dvelimdf(s0, s1, s2, w0, hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1)
  nfcrd(s0, hs0, c1, w0)
  nfcrd(s2, hs0, c0, w0)
  syl6(w0, s2 = s1, (hs0 ∈ c1 ↔ hs0 ∈ c0), c1 = c0)
  eleq2(c1, c0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w((w0 ∧ ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}

blocks.name: dvelimc
blocks.content: Version of ~ dvelim for classes. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm dvelimc(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnfc(s0, c0))
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
  -| wnfc(s2, c0)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wceq(c1, c0))
} = {
  mptru(wi(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnfc(s0, c0)))
  dvelimdc(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, wtru)
  nftru(s0)
  nftru(s2)
  a1i(wtru, wnfc(s0, c1))
  a1i(wtru, wnfc(s2, c0))
  a1i(wtru, wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wceq(c1, c0)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dvelimc(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1)→ F/(s0, c0))
  ⊣ F/(s0, c1)
  ⊣ F/(s2, c0)
  ⊣ (s2 = s1 → c1 = c0)
} = {
  mptru((¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1)→ F/(s0, c0)))
  dvelimdc(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, wtru)
  nftru(s0)
  nftru(s2)
  a1i(wtru, F/(s0, c1))
  a1i(wtru, F/(s2, c0))
  a1i(wtru, (s2 = s1 → c1 = c0))
}

blocks.name: nfcvf
blocks.content: If ` x ` and ` y ` are distinct, then ` x ` is not free in ` y ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Oct-2016.) Avoid ~ ax-ext . (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 10-May-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm nfcvf(setvar s0, setvar s1) {
  |- wi(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnfc(s0, cv(s1)))
} = {
  nfcd(s0, hs0, cv(s1), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  nfv(hs0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  dvelimnf(s0, s1, hs1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  elequ2(hs1, s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s1))
  diff.hs0.w(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nfcvf(setvar s0, setvar s1) {
  ⊢ (¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1)→ F/(s0, s1))
} = {
  nfcd(s0, hs0, s1, ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1))
  nfv(hs0, ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1))
  dvelimnf(s0, s1, hs1, hs0 ∈ s1, hs0 ∈ hs1)
  nfv(s0, hs0 ∈ hs1)
  elequ2(hs1, s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1))
  diff.hs1.w(hs0 ∈ s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, hs1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: nfcvf2
blocks.content: If ` x ` and ` y ` are distinct, then ` y ` is not free in ` x ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Dec-2016.)

blocks.name: cleqf
blocks.content: Establish equality between classes, using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions. See also ~ cleqh . (Contributed by NM, 26-May-1993.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2016.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 17-Nov-2019.) Avoid ~ ax-13 . (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 10-May-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm cleqf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wceq(c0, c1), wal(s0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
} = {
  cleqh(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  nf5ri(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  nfcriv(s0, hs0, c0)
  nf5ri(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  nfcriv(s0, hs0, c1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cleqf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 = c1 ↔ ∀(s0,(s0 ∈ c0 ↔ s0 ∈ c1)))
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c1)
} = {
  cleqh(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  nf5ri(s0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  nfcriv(s0, hs0, c0)
  nf5ri(s0, hs0 ∈ c1)
  nfcriv(s0, hs0, c1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: abeq2f
blocks.content: Equality of a class variable and a class abstraction. In this version, the fact that ` x ` is a non-free variable in ` A ` is explicitly stated as a hypothesis. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 11-May-2017.) Avoid ~ ax-13 . (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 13-May-2023.)

blocks.name: sbabel
blocks.content: Theorem to move a substitution in and out of a class abstraction. (Contributed by NM, 27-Sep-2003.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2016.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 26-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm sbabel(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wcel(cab(s2, w0), c0)), wcel(cab(s2, wsb(s0, s1, w0)), c0))
  -| wnfc(s1, c0)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
} = {
  3bitr4i(wsb(s0, s1, wcel(cab(s2, w0), c0)), wcel(cab(s2, wsb(s0, s1, w0)), c0), wsb(s0, s1, wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(hs0)), w0))))), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(hs0)), wsb(s0, s1, w0))))))
  bitri(wsb(s0, s1, wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(hs0)), w0))))), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(hs0)), wsb(s0, s1, w0))))), wex(hs0, wsb(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(hs0)), w0))))))
  sbex(s0, s1, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(hs0)), w0))))
  exbii(hs0, wsb(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(hs0)), w0)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(hs0)), wsb(s0, s1, w0)))))
  bitri(wsb(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(hs0)), w0)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(hs0)), wsb(s0, s1, w0)))), wa(wsb(s0, s1, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wsb(s0, s1, wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(hs0)), w0)))))
  sban(s0, s1, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(hs0)), w0)))
  anbi12i(wsb(s0, s1, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wsb(s0, s1, wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(hs0)), w0))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(hs0)), wsb(s0, s1, w0))))
  sbf(s0, s1, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  nfcri(s1, hs0, c0)
  sbalv(s0, s1, s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(hs0)), w0), wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(hs0)), wsb(s0, s1, w0)))
  sbrbis(s0, s1, wcel(cv(s2), cv(hs0)), w0, wcel(cv(s2), cv(hs0)))
  sbf(s0, s1, wcel(cv(s2), cv(hs0)))
  nfv(s1, wcel(cv(s2), cv(hs0)))
  sbbii(s0, s1, wcel(cab(s2, w0), c0), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(hs0)), w0)))))
  clabel(s2, hs0, c0, w0)
  clabel(s2, hs0, c0, wsb(s0, s1, w0))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s2), cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(wsb(s0, s1, w0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sbabel(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, wff w0) {
  ⊢ ([s0 / s1]{ s2 | w0 } ∈ c0 ↔ { s2 |[s0 / s1]w0 } ∈ c0)
  ⊣ F/(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
} = {
  3bitr4i([s0 / s1]{ s2 | w0 } ∈ c0, { s2 |[s0 / s1]w0 } ∈ c0, [s0 / s1]∃(hs0,(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ ∀(s2,(s2 ∈ hs0 ↔ w0)))), ∃(hs0,(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ ∀(s2,(s2 ∈ hs0 ↔[s0 / s1]w0)))))
  bitri([s0 / s1]∃(hs0,(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ ∀(s2,(s2 ∈ hs0 ↔ w0)))), ∃(hs0,(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ ∀(s2,(s2 ∈ hs0 ↔[s0 / s1]w0)))), ∃(hs0,[s0 / s1](hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ ∀(s2,(s2 ∈ hs0 ↔ w0)))))
  sbex(s0, s1, hs0, (hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ ∀(s2,(s2 ∈ hs0 ↔ w0))))
  exbii(hs0, [s0 / s1](hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ ∀(s2,(s2 ∈ hs0 ↔ w0))), (hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ ∀(s2,(s2 ∈ hs0 ↔[s0 / s1]w0))))
  bitri([s0 / s1](hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ ∀(s2,(s2 ∈ hs0 ↔ w0))), (hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ ∀(s2,(s2 ∈ hs0 ↔[s0 / s1]w0))), ([s0 / s1]hs0 ∈ c0 ∧[s0 / s1]∀(s2,(s2 ∈ hs0 ↔ w0))))
  sban(s0, s1, hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(s2,(s2 ∈ hs0 ↔ w0)))
  anbi12i([s0 / s1]hs0 ∈ c0, [s0 / s1]∀(s2,(s2 ∈ hs0 ↔ w0)), hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(s2,(s2 ∈ hs0 ↔[s0 / s1]w0)))
  sbf(s0, s1, hs0 ∈ c0)
  nfcri(s1, hs0, c0)
  sbalv(s0, s1, s2, (s2 ∈ hs0 ↔ w0), (s2 ∈ hs0 ↔[s0 / s1]w0))
  sbrbis(s0, s1, s2 ∈ hs0, w0, s2 ∈ hs0)
  sbf(s0, s1, s2 ∈ hs0)
  nfv(s1, s2 ∈ hs0)
  sbbii(s0, s1, { s2 | w0 } ∈ c0, ∃(hs0,(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ ∀(s2,(s2 ∈ hs0 ↔ w0)))))
  clabel(s2, hs0, c0, w0)
  clabel(s2, hs0, c0, [s0 / s1]w0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s2, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w([s0 / s1]w0)
}
